p: The importance of drugs with the quinoline group (highlighted in bold in the structural formulas of TableÂ 8.1) is highlighted in several drugs, especially synthetic quinine derivatives that in the last century have achieved significant space in the pharmaceutical market. In addition to the antimalarial effect, recent studies have shown that the active ingredients quinolinics and derivatives presented antiviral activity (antiviral) (Achan et al. 2011; www.cureffi.org).
